ui.welcome_sarah: Hello {first_name}! I'm Sarah, your worldwide immigration consultant. I help people immigrate to ANY country globally! 🌍
ui.latest_government_data: I use the latest official government data to give you accurate, up-to-date guidance. Let's start - which country do you want to immigrate TO?
ui.excellent_choice_from: Excellent choice! Now, what country are you FROM?
ui.wonderful_immigration_goal: Wonderful! What's your main immigration goal?
ui.great_choice_opportunities: Great choice! {destination} offers amazing opportunities for {goal}. Let me help you understand the process.
ui.confirm_origin_country: Just to confirm - you're currently from {country}?
